> Also, dph, if you need any maze generating code, let me know. I went 
 through a maze phase where I made a few programs to generate random 
 mazes. I also made a maze generator for my TI89 calculator. :)

I found some code that would generate a random maze in C. 
( http://www.delorie.com/game-room/mazes/ ), but any other sources 
would help.  The big issue is making sure that the user can specify 
the width and height of the maze as well width and height of the walls 
 and spaces between the walls in the maze.  I wouldn't mind looking at 
more samples of code though.  What other languages did you write the 
random maze generating code?
